abstracts.cdata!:
The Highway Project for Morocco consists
            of: (a) the construction of about 106 km and the improvement
            of about 72 km of road between Agadir and Marrakech; (b) a
            three-year highway improvement program providing for
            selective strengthening, reconstruction and improvement of
            sections affecting a total of about 4,000 km of primary
            roads; (c) the construction of four bridges; (d) the
            purchase of maintenance equipment and related spare parts;
            and (e) a transport survey of the coastal zone to provide
            the basis for a coordination investment program for this
            region and to make recommendations on transport regulation
            policies and pricing in the country.
